messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] growing up (was Parental Crisis)
messages.msgSnippet: ... Carol, here s a big hug for you, as I am starting to cry! My only son turns 7 today, and I see him growing up (an away) sooo fast. (I think he spoke to me
messages.messageBody:
> Date: Tue, 11 Apr 2000 17:10:44 EDT
> From: bcadams997@...
>Subject: Re: Parental Crisis

Carol wrote:
> Intellectually, I knew my son was growing up. But I don't think with my
>head, I think with my heart. And my heart is several years behind. So if
>you see me this week, give me a comforting hug. Here is how you will
>recognize me: there will be tears in my eyes and I'll be holding Colton's old
>teddy bear.



Carol, here's a big hug for you, as I am starting to cry! My only son turns
7 today, and I see him growing up (an away) sooo fast. (I think he spoke to
me twice last night at his birthday party, as he rollerbladed away with his
friends.) I am going to email your post to a friend so she can cry too. LOL

Thanks for sharing, and don't ever stop thinking with your heart!

Olivia
(Who will never throw away that old teddy bear)
